current_challenge.title: Meatless Monday
current_challenge.description: For today, commit to not consuming any meat. Plan your meals around delicious vegetarian or plant-based options. Explore new recipes or ingredients you haven't tried before. Share your meals on social media to inspire others to join in!
current_challenge.impact: Reducing meat consumption lowers greenhouse gas emissions, conserves water, and decreases the overall carbon footprint associated with livestock farming.
